message.body: Right so this is a problem
O I see. I thought it was NEXT wednesday.
So we should probably meet today.
Yes. Also apparently email our disciplines?
Are you free for a dinner meeting tonight? The four of us can plan in the DC maybe...Sarah suggested 5:30 but we are both free for all of dinner
Hey- just got out of lecture. It turns out that i'll be in DC on wednesday- giving a poster presentation at the NSF - but i just emailed physics, and i could stop by briefly at 530.
We are meeting in the DC lobby at 5:30
